# Astro1Deep - DJProducerTools Creator

Welcome! I'm Astro1Deep, creator of DJProducerTools - the safest music library management suite for DJs and producers on macOS.

## ğŸ¯ Mission
Empower DJs and producers to manage their music libraries with **absolute safety**, **complete transparency**, and **zero risk** of data loss.

## ğŸ›ï¸ Featured Project: DJProducerTools v2.0.0

### What It Does
- Deduplicates music libraries (bit-perfect SHA-256)
- Backs up DJ software metadata (Serato, Traktor, Rekordbox, Ableton)
- Analyzes library health with local ML
- Quarantines problems safely with full recovery
- Shows progress always (progress bars, spinners, real-time updates)
- Includes complete debug mode for transparency

### Quick Start
```bash

```
